item.title: Help with trade method
item.dc:creator: @Avalon Avalon
item.description:
@Avalon wrote:

If you only remove:

if(other.playerRights == 2){
sM("Admins cannot trade.");
return;
}

admins will be able to initiate a trade with players, but not likewise. If you only remove:

if(other.playerRights == 2){
sM("Admins cannot trade.");
return;
}

players will be able to initiate a trade with admins, but not the other way around. Removing both allows it either way.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with trade method
item.dc:creator: @grayfoxx grayfoxx
item.description:
@grayfoxx wrote:

this happens when any (playerRights) person trys to trade with an admin. so you are saying if I remove

if(other.playerRights == 2){
sM(“Admins cannot trade.”);
return;
}
if(playerRights == 2){
sM(“Admins cannot trade.”);
return;
}

then i will be able to have my staff members trade?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with trade method
item.dc:creator: @Avalon Avalon
item.description:
@Avalon wrote:

if(other.playerRights == 2){
sM("Admins cannot trade.");
return;
}
if(playerRights == 2){
sM("Admins cannot trade.");
return;
}

Those statements check to see if the player initiating the trade or the player at the other end of the trade are admins. Remove that segment and they will be able to trade/be traded to.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with trade method
item.dc:creator: @grayfoxx grayfoxx
item.description:
@grayfoxx wrote:

everytime I try to trade with an admin it says “admins can not trade”
so I got some help to find where it is but I cant seem to figure out how to fix it.

this is what I found.

if(other.interfaceOpened){
int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].absX;
int EnemyY = PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].absY;
TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY);
sM(“Other player is busy at the moment.”);
return;
}
if(action == 1){
return;
}
if(other.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerName)){
sM(“Other player is busy at the moment.”);
return;
}
if(other.action == 1){
return;
}
if(other.playerRights == 2){
sM(“Admins cannot trade.”);
return;
}
if(playerRights == 2){
sM(“Admins cannot trade.”);
return;
}

is this the trade method?

please help

Read full topic
